mantras: All is well, right here, right now
You are enough
Don’t be afraid to give up the good and go for the great
Laughter lightens the load
Be a warrior, not a worrier
choose to be calm and at peace
Life is Good
let go of anything not for the highest good
Change the things you can change, make peace with what you can't
You are exactly where you need to be
It will get done.
Your greatest struggles are your greatest lessons
Only you can steal your own joy
You control your thoughts they do not control you
Greatness must be earned
To struggle is not to fail
Go slowly,Take the time to do things right
Look back at the past. Marvel at how far you have come.
You Can Find an Excuse or You Can Find a Way
Wake Up. Kick Ass. Be Kind.
Yesterday You Said Tomorrow
Don’t Wish for It, Work for It
Excellence Does Not Require Perfection
Our Intentions Create Our Reality
Know Your Limitations, and Defy Them
It’s The Start That Stops Most People
Work Harder!
Tough Times Don’t Last; Tough People Do
Be stubborn about your goals
You are what you do, not what you say you'll do
If it were easy, you wouldn't be doing it
Today is tomorrow's yesterday
Keep Going
Don't stop, until you're proud
This is the beginning of anything you want
Failure is part of success, not the opposite
Do what scares you until it doesn't
Defeat is temporary. Giving up makes it permanent
Take a breath and look at how far you've come
Work. Sweat. Achieve.
No struggle, No progress
Satisfy your soul, not society
Don't watch the clock, Be the clock and keep going
If you can't find a way, make one
Perfection isn't attainable, but chase it, and you may catch excellence
It is never too late to be what you might have been.
